snippet: Once marked as a dead man, Igor Strelkov made his first public appearance in Donetsk in a move to assert authority over fractious separatist militias.
abstract: Igor Strelkov, native Russian and commander of the separatist militias in Ukraine, is powerful, fearsome and mysterious figure; he makes his first public appearance after months of fighting in move to assert authority over fractious militias; as ultranationalist and reactionary, he fits increasingly familiar profile in Russia.

byline.contributor: Sabrina Tavernise contributed reporting from Donetsk, Ukraine, and David M. Herszenhorn from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: Once marked as a dead man, Igor Strelkov made his first public appearance in Donetsk in a move to assert authority over fractious separatist militias.

headline.main: Shadowy Rebel Wields Iron Fist in Ukraine Fight
headline.print_headline: Shadowy Rebel Flexes Iron Fist in Ukraine Fight
